Description: Head and upper torso of a green glazed composition figure of Isis clutching her right breast; lappet-wig with fine ringlets; hole in the modius for the attachment of a headdress(now lost); blue detail; the inlay is lost from the eyes.
Curator's comments: Published: Walker & Higgs, Cleopatra of Egypt (2001): 104-105 No 126 [wrongly recorded as EA 20549]
Bibliographic references: Walker & Higgs 2001 / Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth (126)
Condition: incomplete - lower body and headdress lost
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
